title: Saniya birthday proposal multi-page website with playful Yes/No flow and animations

requirements.text: Create a 4-page client-side routed React experience that follows the sequence Page 1 → Page 2 → Page 3 → Page 4, with each route rendering its page correctly on direct navigation/refresh.

quotes: make a cute front page and ask a qustion for her ... after she says yes make a celebration effect and load the second page ... load 3rd page ... load the 4th page

acceptanceCriteria: App has 4 distinct routes/pages (Page 1, Page 2, Page 3, Page 4).
Navigating directly to any page route loads that page without errors.
The primary intended flow is Page 1 → Page 2 → Page 3 → Page 4 via in-app navigation.

requirements.text: Implement Page 1 as a cute birthday-themed landing page that includes Saniya’s name and the proposal question “Will you marry me?” with two buttons: “Yes” and “No”.

quotes: make a cute front page ... the question is will you marry me and there you prefer her 2 options yes and no

acceptanceCriteria: Page 1 prominently displays “Saniya” and the question text “Will you marry me?”.
Page 1 shows two interactive buttons labeled “Yes” and “No”.

requirements.text: On Page 1, implement a progressive “No” interaction: each time the user clicks “No”, the “No” label (or a nearby prompt) changes to a different escalating message (e.g., “Really?”, “Are you sure?”, etc.) and continues repeating/cycling until the user clicks “Yes”.

quotes: she will going to click on no then the no will change in really ? then again she wass clicking on no then again ask somthing different on really reapte this process until she says yes

acceptanceCriteria: Clicking “No” at least 5 times produces at least 5 distinct messages over time (cycle or escalate).
“No” never advances to the next page; only “Yes” advances the flow.
The interaction remains responsive and does not break layout at varying message lengths.

requirements.text: When the user clicks “Yes” on Page 1, play a celebration effect (confetti and/or hearts) and then automatically navigate to Page 2 after a short delay.

quotes: after she says yes make a celebration effect and load the second page

acceptanceCriteria: Clicking “Yes” triggers a visible celebration animation.
After the animation starts, the app automatically navigates to Page 2 within ~0.5–2 seconds.

requirements.text: Implement Page 2 with the question text: “In your point of view, your boyfriend is really hot and cute and sexy.” Provide two options: “Yes” and “Obviously”.

quotes: in second page give again a question and the second question is like this "In your point of view your boyfriend is really hot and cute and sexy" again put 2 option yes and obviously

acceptanceCriteria: Page 2 displays the specified question in polished, grammatical English while preserving the meaning.
Page 2 shows two buttons labeled exactly “Yes” and “Obviously”.

requirements.text: On Page 2, when the user selects either option (“Yes” or “Obviously”), play a kiss effect animation and then automatically navigate to Page 3 after a short delay.

quotes: after she says yes make a kiss effect and load 3rd page

acceptanceCriteria: Clicking either button triggers a visible kiss/heart-style animation.
After the animation starts, the app automatically navigates to Page 3 within ~0.5–2 seconds.

requirements.text: Implement Page 3 as a birthday wishes page that shows a full birthday message and ends with the exact last line: “I love you so much, my ardhangani!”.

quotes: load 3rd page and give her birthday wish all page and last line is i lobe you so much my ardhangani !

acceptanceCriteria: Page 3 includes a birthday wish message addressed to Saniya.
The final line on Page 3 is exactly: “I love you so much, my ardhangani!”.

requirements.text: After Page 3 is shown, automatically navigate to Page 4 after a short delay (no user action required).
acceptanceCriteria: Page 3 transitions automatically to Page 4 within ~2–6 seconds.
Users can still refresh on Page 4 and see it render correctly.

requirements.text: Implement Page 4 as an emotional final page that asks: “Do you really like this??” and displays: “Never leave me” followed by an emotional emoji (use English user-facing text).

quotes: load the 4th page and ask do you really like this ?? and say never leave me and emotinal emoji

acceptanceCriteria: Page 4 displays the question “Do you really like this??”.
Page 4 displays the message “Never leave me” with an emotional emoji.
All user-facing text is in English.

requirements.text: Apply a cohesive, cute romantic birthday visual theme across all pages using a baby pink & white color palette (no blue/purple as primary), with consistent typography, spacing, and button styles.

quotes: yes baby pink and white combination

acceptanceCriteria: All pages share consistent styling (background, typography, buttons) aligned to baby pink & white.
Primary UI elements do not use blue/purple as the primary palette.
Design remains readable and visually consistent across common screen sizes.

requirements.text: Add generated static images to frontend/public/assets/generated and render them in the UI (do not serve images from the backend).

quotes: Add required generated static images into the frontend and render them in the UI from frontend/public/assets/generated (do not serve generated images from the backend).

acceptanceCriteria: The app includes generated images located at frontend/public/assets/generated.
At least one generated image is visibly used in the UI (e.g., background/decoration).
No backend endpoints are used to fetch or serve these images.

constraints: Use English for any user-facing text.
Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui (compose them instead).
Do not edit immutable hook files: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, or frontend/src/main.tsx.
Backend must remain single-actor Motoko if any backend work is introduced (not required for this request).
nonGoals: Persisting user progress/state on the backend.
Integrations with third-party services (music streaming, social APIs, external databases).

required: Cute baby-pink heart confetti seamless background (bg-hearts-seamless.dim_1920x1080.png)
Kawaii birthday cake illustration with pastel pink accents (cake-kawaii.dim_512x512.png)
Cute kissing/love icon illustration in baby-pink style (kiss-icon.dim_512x512.png)
